name: Kelton Global
description:
Kelton Global is a research consultancy that transforms rich insights into actionable strategic plans. Kelton integrates market research, cultural insights, branding, communications, and design to move brands confidently into the future.
With offices in Los Angeles, Chicago, New York, and London, Kelton is proud to work with more than 100 of the Fortune 500 companies and thousands of other well-loved brands.

locations.address: Purple Market Research Ltd., Stirling House, Breasy Place 9 Burroughs Gardens, Hendon
